channel.title: This sucks
channel.description: well, im moving soon and when we move my mom is putting spyware on my computer to see every keystroke and page i look at.. they will check it once a week, and if i remove it ill get grounded anyways to get passed it? or to cover?

item.title: This sucks
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Put in another keylogger to log her password to her keylogger and then when you have the password, disable it and re-enable it.

Read full topic

item.title: This sucks
item.dc:creator: @existingqwer existingqwer
item.description:
@existingqwer wrote:

Let her do it for a few weeks and then confront her saying how untrusting she is. Try and make her feel guilty. If you’re incapable of doing that you’ll want to disable the program.

First you have to find out what the program is called. If you’re an admin on the computer you should be able to disable the process if you can identify it. You might be able to delete it if you’re not afraid of them finding out.

I personally can’t imagine a mother taking the time to look through all the stuff you do in a week, it would take ages.

Read full topic

item.title: This sucks
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

Just tell you’re mom she’s a fucking cunt and to fuck off. What you do is your personal business. Or you could stage a conversation about your mom and how much you hate her to make her feel bad. I’m assuming you’re 12-18 and if you’re that old you can do what you want?

Read full topic

item.title: This sucks
item.dc:creator: @Tribal Tribal
item.description:
@Tribal wrote:

i’m lucky my mom doesn’t even know what a keylogger is and if it exists
anyway the answer is very simple :

go to your taskmanager and kill the process of the keylogger once your going to look for porn or anything else that’s not allowed.
When you’re finished run the process again.
By doing this the part of going to porn wouldnt be keylogged as it was disabled at that time

Read full topic

item.title: This sucks

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

it is mine

[quote=“davidude36, post:2, topic:111843”]Well… what wont they let you do? look at porn?

And btw i think that sucks that your parents do that… it would be imbarrising if you were talking to people on msn about personal stuff…

I’m lucky that my mum trusts me :D[/quote]

no… i cuss… and i spend alot of time on the comp. they get curious
